subject: Athletics and Sports
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: The Indy Racing League will culminate when the Indy 500 winner Dario Franchitti tries to hold off Scott Dixon and Kanaan for the championship.
snippet: The Indy Racing League will culminate when the Indy 500 winner Dario Franchitti tries to hold off Scott Dixon and Kanaan for the championship.
